description:
Baidu has launched its latest foundation AI models, ERNIE 4.5 and ERNIE X1, and is offering them free for individuals through ERNIE Bot. The company says that it aims to “push the boundaries of multimodal and reasoning models” by providing advanced capabilities at a more accessible price point. Baidu plans to integrate these models into […]

title: Baidu undercuts rival AI models with ERNIE 4.5 and ERNIE X1

description:

description:
